name: Attack on Titan: Escape from Certain Death
storyline: Set before the Female Titan arc, the Survey Corps are ordered to investigate Elsnir Castle. The protagonist is an original Survey Corps member and a local of the area; they guide the group to their location. During their investigation, Titans surround them and the ground gives way beneath them, scattering the group. The protagonist's omni-directional mobility gear is broken from the fall. They must escape the castle's underground ruins by working alongside the characters from the series.
summary: Attack on Titan: Escape from Certain Death is a visual novel and game made for the Nintendo 3DS. It features an original story which takes place before the 57th Exterior Scouting Mission.
